title: Square matrices
content: In the following, the square matrix algebra is defined as extensible structure ` Mat ` . In this subsection, however, only square matrices and their basic properties are regarded. This includes showing that ` ( N Mat R ) ` is a left module, see ~ matlmod . That ` ( N Mat R ) ` is a ring and an associative algebra is shown in the next subsection, after theorems about the identity matrix are available. Nevertheless, ` ( N Mat R ) ` is called "matrix ring" or "matrix algebra" already in this subsection.

blocks.name: matbas0
blocks.content: There is no matrix for a not finite dimension or a proper class as the underlying ring. (Contributed by AV, 28-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm matbas0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmat, c1)), emptycls))
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmat, c1)), emptycls, cfv(cbs, emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, universe))))
  fveq2d(cbs, co(c0, cmat, c1), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, universe))))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, cfn, c1, universe, cmat, co(co(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))))
  df-mat(hs0, hs1)
  base0()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cfn)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
}

thm matval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cmat, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c1, cmmul, cotp(c0, c0, c0)))
} = {
  syl5eq(c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5)), co(c0, cmat, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cmat, c1), co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elex(c1, c2)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfn, c1, universe, cmat, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5)), co(co(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), c4, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl6eqr(co(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), c4, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveqan12rd(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c1, cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq2d(cfv(cmulr, cnx), co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), c5, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl6eqr(co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), c5, co(c1, cmmul, cotp(c0, c0, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveqan12rd(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c1, cotp(c0, c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oteq123d(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0), c0, c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-mat(hs0, hs1)
  ovex(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfn)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c5)))

thm matval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 =(c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[Mat]c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c1[freeLMod](c0 √ó c0))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c1[maMul]< c0, c0, c0 >)
} = {
  syl5eq(c3, (c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >), (c0[Mat]c1), (c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0[Mat]c1)=(c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c1, c2)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfn, c1, universe, cmat, (c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >), ((hs1[freeLMod](hs0 √ó hs0))[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx),(hs1[maMul]< hs0, hs0, hs0 >)>))
  oveq12d((hs1[freeLMod](hs0 √ó hs0)), csts, <(√ó ` ndx),(hs1[maMul]< hs0, hs0, hs0 >)>, c4, <(√ó ` ndx), c5 >, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  syl6eqr((hs1[freeLMod](hs0 √ó hs0)), c4, (c1[freeLMod](c0 √ó c0)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  oveqan12rd(hs1, cfrlm, (hs0 √ó hs0), c1, (c0 √ó c0), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  sqxpeqd(hs0, c0, hs0 = c0)
  opeq2d((√ó ` ndx), (hs1[maMul]< hs0, hs0, hs0 >), c5, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  syl6eqr((hs1[maMul]< hs0, hs0, hs0 >), c5, (c1[maMul]< c0, c0, c0 >), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  oveqan12rd(hs1, cmmul, < hs0, hs0, hs0 >, c1, < c0, c0, c0 >, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  id(hs1 = c1)
  oteq123d(hs0, hs0, hs0, c0, c0, c0, hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  df-mat(hs0, hs1)
  ovex(c4, csts, <(√ó ` ndx), c5 >)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfn)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c((c4[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), c5 >))
}

blocks.content: Reverse closure for the matrix algebra. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm matrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, universe)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c2, cmat, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  nsyl2(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  n0i(c0, c1)
  3eqtr4g(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, universe))))
  fveq2d(cbs, c4, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, universe))))
  syl5eq(c4, emptycls, co(c2, cmat, c3), wn(wa(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, universe))))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c2, cfn, c3, universe, cmat, co(co(cv(hs1), cfrlm, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), co(cv(hs1), cmmul, cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))))
  df-mat(hs0, hs1)
  base0()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cfn)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: eqmat
blocks.content: Two square matrices of the same dimension are equal if they have the same entries. (Contributed by AV, 25-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqmat(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, cmat, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c3, c3)), wfn(c2, cxp(c3, c3)))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(c0, cxp(c3, c3)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cxp(c3, c3))))
  matbas2i(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, c4, c5)
  elmapfn(c0, cfv(cbs, c5), cxp(c3, c3))
  syl(wcel(c2, c1), wfn(c2, cxp(c3, c3)), wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cxp(c3, c3))))
  matbas2i(c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  elmapfn(c2, cfv(cbs, c5), cxp(c3, c3))
  eqfnov2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, c2)
}

blocks.content: The matrix ring is a linear structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Sep-2015.)

thm matlmod(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  eqidd(cfv(cbs, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  matbas(c0, c1, crg, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)), c2)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0))), cfv(cplusg, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0))))))
  matplusg(c0, c1, crg, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)), c2)
  eqidd(cfv(csca, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  matsca(c0, c1, crg, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))))

  matvsca(c0, c1, crg, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)), c2)
  eqid(co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))

  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))

thm matvscl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c0, cmat, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c7))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), c5), wcel(c7, clmod), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7))), wcel(c4, c5))

  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))
  fveq2d(cbs, c1, cfv(csca, c7), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)))
}
